name: Lego Dimensions: Zane Fun Pack
summary: Let creativity be your guide to a building and gaming adventure – journey through unexpected worlds and team up with unlikely allies on a quest to defeat the evil Lord Vortech. Build Zane and add him to a crazy mash-up multiverse of your favorite characters! Place him on the Lego Toy Pad to bring him to life in the game, then activate his special Acrobat, Spinjitzu, Stealth, Boomerang, Dive and X-Ray Vision abilities to solve puzzles and put the freeze on enemies. When he needs to fly, take off in the NinjaCopter and rebuild it into a Glaciator and Freeze Fighter for upgraded in-game powers!
